attributes.action: Create Cadet Units in Every school in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To create cadet units to promote good citizenship and community values which already are under threat from influences such as drugs,bad parenting,lack of discipline in the home,at school and in the community in general and make cadet service a key activity for every child male and female between the ages of 12-14 years of age.
